Title: Enhances know your customer requirements and to clarify that sharing a mobile sports wagering account is a criminal activity
Summary: Enhances know your customer requirements; clarifies that sharing a mobile sports wagering account through account sharing or proxy betting is a criminal activity.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Amd ยง1367-a, RWB L; amd ยง225.00, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the penal law, in relation to enhancing know your customer requirements and to clarify that sharing a mobile sports wagering account is a criminal activity
